questions.title: 如果你不介意的话，我们想住在你的别墅里。
questions.answer: If you don't mind, we'll stay in your villa.

questions.title: 如果你不介意的话，请给我一本你亲手签名的书。
questions.answer: If you don't mind, please give me an autographed book.

questions.title: 如果你不介意的话，你可以来我的别墅喝一杯。
questions.answer: If you don't mind, you can come to my villa and have a drink.

questions.title: 如果你不介意的话，请同销售经理和我一同飞往纽约参加世博会。
questions.answer: If you don't mind, please fly to New York and take part in the worldExposition with sales manager and me.

title: ——如果你不介意的话，我将会帮助你。
——不用担心。

answer.en: If you don't mind, I'll give you a hand.

title: ——如果你不介意的话，我希望今晚你能成为我的舞伴。
——这是我的荣幸。

answer.en: If you don't mind, I hope you can be my partner tonight.

title: ——如果你不介意，演讲后休息一下来杯咖啡怎样。
——再来一个三明治。

answer.en: To have a coffee break after speech if you don't mind.
